subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: The coat is one of the most coveted prizes in sports. Unusual? Yes, but it does not even make the top 10 when it comes to the strange things presented to the winners of other events.
